scripts.dev: concurrently -n [FRONT]," [BACK]" -c green,yellow -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "yarn --cwd ./frontend run dev" "yarn --cwd ./backend run dev"
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd ./frontend run lint && yarn --cwd ./backend run lint
scripts.fix: yarn --cwd ./frontend run fix && yarn --cwd ./backend run fix
